R

render(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameMenu
render the menu by drawing the stage of the menu and calling the active menu page's render method.
render(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameMenuPage
automatically called by the GameMenu.render(SpriteBatch) method if the page is the current active one.
render(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameState
automatically called whenever the GDXGame.render() method is called and the gamestate is active.
render(float) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameState
This method is not used anymore since we split up the render call into our own update and render method within the GDXGame class.
render(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameStateLogic
automatically called whenever the GameState.render(SpriteBatch) method is called.
render() - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GDXGame
automatically called by Game.render() method per frame.
renderGameObject(SpriteBatch, Camera, AnimatedGameObject, AnimatedSprite) - Static method in class com.gdxgame.core.utils.GameUtils
renders an animated game object using the given animated sprite.
resize(int, int) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameState
automatically called whenever the Game.resize(int, int) method is called and the gamestate is active.
resize(int, int) - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameStateLogic
automatically called whenever the GameState.resize(int, int) method is called.
ResourceManager - Enum in com.gdxgame.core.utils
The ResourceManager singleton is the core singleton to load and dispose resources.
resume() - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameState
automatically called whenever the Game.setScreen(Screen) method is called and the gamestate gets active and was already initialized.
resume() - Method in class com.gdxgame.core.GameStateLogic
automatically called whenever the GameState.show() or GameState.resume() method is called.
